citations.narrative:
Protocol 06172002 is approved to hold rabbits for 'usually 24-28 hours' but up to 5 days in transport containers that are 10
inches high, and the facility maintains these rabbits on shipping gel for a water source instead of giving potable water
daily. The transport containers and water substitute do not meet the stipulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The facility did
not report these exceptions to the Animal Welfare Act, nor the number of animals affected, on the annual report. The
facility must report any exceptions to the Animal Welfare Act and number of animals affected in the annual report.
Correct by 22 December 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Jason Sifkarovski, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
